aka: Anthony Joshua: Oko w oko z Kliczką
this_title: Anthony Joshua: The Road to Klitschko
trans_title: Anthony Joshua: Oko w oko z Kliczką
introduction: Follows the IBF World Heavyweight champion over the course of two years as he prepares for the biggest fight of his career, how he rose to the pinnacle of his sport and how he relaxes away from the ring.
chinese_title: Anthony Joshua: The Road to Klitschko
